alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 9:47AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of west central Barnstable, Plymouth, Bristol, northeastern Washington, eastern Newport, southeastern Kent, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 946 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norwell to near West Greenwich. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Plymouth, Taunton, East Providence, Dartmouth, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Bridgewater, North Kingstown, Marshfield, Newport, Bristol, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne and Somerset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
